entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
